key_risks: Legal and regulatory risks, including ongoing litigation and disputes over intellectual property
Industry cyclicality and supply chain vulnerabilities
Geopolitical risks, particularly U.S.-China trade tensions
Intense competitive pressures from established players
controversies: Class action lawsuit (McCausland v. Veeco Instruments, Inc.) alleging labor code violations
Dispute with Aixtron, Inc. over arbitration and discovery orders
environmental_issues: Energy-efficient product designs and supply chain responsibility
social_issues: Employee safety and labor code violations related to overtime pay and timekeeping practices
governance_issues: Legal disputes and regulatory compliance challenges
